sentence.Network_en: Lord Luce's capitulation to pressure from the Duke of Edinburgh has stored up huge problems for the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢斯勋爵迫于爱丁堡公爵的压力作了让步，为日后埋下了巨大隐患。

sentence.Network_en: He could order a dinner almost as well as Mr. Luce.

sentence.Network_en: Like many of his fellow , colonists Mr. Luce was a high or rather a deep conservative.
sentence.Network_cn: 像他一样的移民中,卢斯先生是许多偏激的――或者不如说是顽固的――保守分子中的一个.
